title: (x) Formatt - Identikal Fonts {Lucifermonkey}
content:
Anybody know where to get the font FORMATT? Much love to anyone who helps out.   
Peace.
author: ramonaheadswitch

comments.content:
The only reference I found said FORMATT was the name of a company that made press-on type, it was not the name of a typeface.   
   
Are you thinking of [Berthold Formata](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212121306/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/adobe_lib/080218000.html)?

Formatt was offered by Identikal Fonts once upon a time (2002). It is referenced here about halfway down the page:   
   
 [http://www.fontlover.com/archive/2002\_02\_01\_fontscoop\_archive.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212121306/http:/www.fontlover.com/archive/2002_02_01_fontscoop_archive.html)   
   
You might try to contact Identikal directly. I did not find it offered on the website though.   
   
 [http://www.identikalshop.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212121306/http:/www.identikalshop.com/)   
   
Good luck!   
   
-C
